com.hazelcast.cache.impl.merge.entry

Class LazyCacheEntryView<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.merge.entry.LazyCacheEntryView<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheEntryView<K,V>

    public class LazyCacheEntryView<K,V>
extends Object
implements CacheEntryView<K,V>
    An implementation of CacheEntryView for converting key and value to object when they are touched as lazy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the expiration time in milliseconds of the cache entry.
